channel.title: toughts on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in toughts on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: From Chaos There Shall Be Order
item.description: Dear Readers. Today I want to talk to you about something I discovered over years of working and experience. Also something that I can see in the world repeating over and over again. Not just in Software business but also in History in Human nature in Physics and Systems. So let’s see what I’m talking about. What is Chaos? Chaos is a state of utter confusion. Chaos is the opposite of order.
